title: Cilent
body: My league client crashed twice today and it costed me 35 minutes que timer and 12 lp. Is their anyway i can get back those lp i lost it is really messed up.

replies.body:
There's no way to recover LP or for us to modify/grant LP for any reason. The system was designed this way to prevent any sort of abuse of the system.

Crashes in the client, especially if they happen in champ select, are often caused by your client dropping its connection to the game service platform entirely. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are in line with the settings we recommend.

Let me know if those steps caused any positive change.
